news.title: 特朗普怒斥法官，全球关税战再起
加拿大寻求贸易谈判，美最高法院推翻特朗普关税
news.title0: Canada looks to trade talks after US Supreme Court tosses Trump's tariffs
news.content: 美国最高法院裁定特朗普全球关税违宪，加拿大对此表示欢迎，但强调仍需应对钢铁、汽车等领域的遗留关税，并准备启动美墨加贸易协定的审议。
news.content0: Celebrations in Canada over the decision by the US Supreme Court to strike down President Donald Trump's global tariffs were both brief and muted.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 药物副作用引发成瘾，数百患者向BBC倾诉
news.title0: 'That's me!': Hundreds tell BBC how medication triggered gambling and other addictions
news.content: 数百名患者向BBC表示，用于治疗帕金森等疾病的药物引发了赌博、性瘾等冲动行为，导致巨额债务和家庭破裂，而医生对此警告不足。
news.content0: Emma couldn't understand why she had suddenly developed a gambling problem, until she read a recent BBC News article.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 法国极左翼因学生被杀案陷入困境
news.title0: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
news.content: 一名民族主义学生在里昂被疑似极左翼分子杀害，导致法国极左翼政党“不屈法国”及其领袖梅朗雄遭到广泛谴责，可能改变法国政治格局。
news.content0: Is the far left about to replace the far right as the pariah of French politics?
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普称考虑对伊朗进行有限军事打击
news.title0: Trump says he is considering limited military strike on Iran
news.content: 美国总统特朗普表示，为施压伊朗达成核协议，他正考虑对伊朗进行有限军事打击，并称世界将在十天内知晓结果。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has said he is considering a limited military strike on Iran in order to pressure its leaders to agree a deal to curb the nuclear programme.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 曼迪·摩尔夫妇在洛杉矶大火后重建梦想家园
news.title0: Mandy Moore and Taylor Goldsmith nearly lost their dream home in the LA fires. Here’s how they rebuilt
news.content: 美国女星曼迪·摩尔夫妇位于洛杉矶的梦想家园在去年野火中严重受损，他们耗时数年进行重建，并在《建筑文摘》中分享了这一历程。
news.content0: In 2020, Mandy Moore and her musician husband Taylor Goldsmith bought their dream home in Altadena, California, as a family of two, hiring a team to begin renovating the romantic Spanish Colonial Revival property and update its 1930s charm. In 2023, as a family of four, with another baby on the way, they moved in and began living their new life in Altadena’s enclave of historic architecture, mountain views and small-town charm.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 波兰维利奇卡盐矿：欧洲最奇特的地下景点
news.title0: The underground salt kingdom that became one of Europe’s strangest attractions
news.content: 波兰维利奇卡盐矿拥有700年历史，如今成为联合国教科文组织世界遗产，每日吸引数千游客深入地下，探索这座由盐构成的“地下王国”。
news.content0: Down at the bottom of 380 dizzying steps, the walls are an imperfect gray. They look like rock — but they taste salty. How do visitors know? They’re encouraged to lick them.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿美元奥运场馆设计引争议
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计，灵感源自当地“昆士兰”式住宅，但耗资23亿美元在遗产公园内新建场馆的计划引发争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 哥伦比亚叛军用廉价无人机挑战政府军
news.title0: How $600 Drones Are Outsmarting Colombia’s Billion-Dollar Military
news.content: 哥伦比亚反政府武装使用数百美元的商用无人机，改装后携带手榴弹攻击政府军和设施，以低成本战术挑战数十亿美元的国防预算。
news.content0: Colombian soldiers defending a state-owned oil pumping station near the border with Venezuela were under attack. Two powerful insurgent groups that have been fighting the Colombian state for decades had been regularly stealing fuel from it.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 奥地利阿尔卑斯山发生雪崩致三人死亡
news.title0: 3 People Are Killed in Series of Avalanches in Austrian Alps
news.content: 奥地利阿尔卑斯山区发生一系列雪崩，导致三名滑雪者死亡，其中包括一名偏离标记滑道的德国男子及其儿子。
news.content0: Three people were killed in a series of avalanches in Austria on Friday, the police said.
news.author: NYTimes
